name: Movin' Mole
description:
Movin' Mole finally allows you to fulfil your fantasy of becoming a forever dancing mole. Boogie your way deeper and deeper into the soil making sure to avoid the equally rhythmic foxes trying to get a bite of that sweet tush.

Move your way round the levels in time with the beat to get to the mole hole and pass down to the next level, Hit a dance move to get dazzle the following foxes out of existence and most of all make sure your health doesn't dip all the way down. 

Use WASD to move (in time with the beat) 

Use spacebar to bust a move and get rid of a fox (in time with the beat!) 

Get to the mole hole and avoid the foxes!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$249292/

Made by

AllTheBees (you're here!)

Nat Cariss: https://nathanielcariss.co.uk/

Jesse Parsons: https://jesseparsons.com/
